title: Override XShmCreateImage to return null in tracees.

Don't abort if /etc/pulse/client.conf is inaccessible

Null-terminate the lines in arg_env to ensure environment variable value...

Initial design presentation (with many TODOs).
Start centralizing process state changes.
Always resume with PTRACE_SYSCALL when restarting a syscall.
Revert the recorder scheduler to e111c5642dca9c4efa6b0280af3a6c265dd467b7~1.
Propagate DRI/DRM workaround to syscallbuf, and clean up ioctl handling a bit.
Don't probe seccomp-bpf support, and enable the syscallbuf by default.
Run to breakpoints when possible during async-signal replay instead of (always) single-stepping.
Use a better name for "fake events".
Make buffer-flushes interruptible, incidentally protecting them from stray SIGCHLDs.
Fix out-of-order statements and remove redundant scheduler state.
Tweak the scheduler to avoid busy-waiting.
Buffer recv() calls.
Handle segfaults caused by jumping into garbage, and add a test.
Wrap two of the top buffer-flushing syscalls.
Buffer access() calls.
Buffer *stat calls.
Buffer fcntl calls.
Run tests faster when there are multiple CPUs.
Manage tests with cmake, and make them parallelizable.
Build tests with cmake, and run them in their own tmp dirs.
Normalize tests.
Make the "threads" test run faster.
Buffer close() calls, and fix some straggler tests.
Wrap open64 to buffer calls from NSPR
Fix a regression that a test should have caught, except that rr happily recorded a segfault and the test passed.
Buffer some simple syscalls: madvise, open, read, and write.
Initial support for handling signals delivered to the syscallbuf lib.
Tune scheduler defaults, make them run-time configurable, and disable a bad test.
Adjust the rbc downwards after a buffer-flush, to simplify debugger interrupts.
Improve error checking during replay (with a few clean-ups).
Don't leave nondeterministic bits of rr state on tracees' stacks.
gdb will request in accessible memory, guard against that.
Drop syscall buffer at fork() because ... yeah
Handle SIGCHLD interrupts in more places.
Compare all regs to see if we're at the execution target.

Support perf_event_open().

Convert syscallbuf initialization into a "magic" rrcall, preparing for #7.
Support sigprocmask and add a test.
Sundry syscall buffer bug fixes and cleanups.
Use /dev/shm for syscall buffer. Resolves #166.
Sundry janitorial work on syscall buffer code.
Only statically link with uncommon libraries, and strip packages, for a 6x space savings.
Always replay registers at emulated signal delivery. Resolves #127.
Add some logging helpers.
Only warn about the syscallbuf being disabled during recording, not replay.
Separate rr args from tracee args. Fixes regression from #153.
Rename --record/--replay to record/replay. Resolves #154.
Dust off a C union nugget I forgot about to clean up some glorp.

Use getopt to parse arguments.
Build packages on travis to ensure that doesn't break.

"cleanup" before starting a new test. Resolves #85.
